sentences.english: Emerging Asia has grown by an annual average of 8% over the past three years—as fast as before the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 過去三年來以年均8%的速度增長着，和危機前一樣。

sentences.english: The rainfall in this area averages 800mm a year.
sentences.chinese: 這個地區降雨量年均800毫米。

sentences.english: Before the center was built, families earned an average of $100 a year.
sentences.chinese: 在這個中心建立之前，家庭年均收入爲100美元。

sentences.english: Ahvaz's annual average of PM10s was 372 micrograms per cubic meter.
sentences.chinese: 阿瓦士年均可吸入顆粒物含量爲每立方米372微克。

sentences.english: Average annual appreciation for 16 eastern cities is more than 36 percent.
sentences.chinese: 16座東部沿海城市的年均漲幅更是超過36%。

sentences.english: Mating occurs all year long with the gestation period of approximately 2 years.
sentences.chinese: 非洲象常年均可交配，母象的懷孕期大約2年。

sentences.english: "OSH" training programmes are organised throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 香港郵政全年均有舉辦職安健訓練計劃。

sentences.english: Generally it can be grown under the average annual temperature around 20℃in frost-free or frostless areas.
sentences.chinese: 一般年均溫20℃左右，無霜或少霜地區均可種植。

sentences.english: Its annual production capacity for formaldehyde is 2.2 billion pounds.
sentences.chinese: 其年均福爾馬林產能約22億磅。

sentences.english: The hens raised on their farm each average 240 eggs a year.
sentences.chinese: 他們農場養的雞每隻年均產蛋240個。

definition: the corresponding time period (in a different year etc)/concurrent/synchronous
year after year/with each passing year/over the years
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
